constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 200 (Wednesday, November 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FORTENBERRY:
H.R. 5996.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority for this bill is pursuant to
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H6370]

latestAction.text: ASSUMING FIRST SPONSORSHIP - Mr. Carter (GA) asked unanimous consent that he may hereafter be considered as the first sponsor of H.R. 5996, a bill originally introduced by Representative Fortenberry, for the purpose of adding cosponsors and requesting reprintings pursuant to clause 7 of rule XII. Agreed to without objection.

title: Eliminate, Neutralize, and Disrupt Wildlife Trafficking Reauthorization and Improvements Act of 2021
